name: Sazi Apartment Tran Quoc Toan
address: Unit 13, Floor 4, 30 Tran Quoc Toan, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 600 metres from Hoan Kiem Lake, Sazi Apartment offers accommodation with private balcony in Hanoi. The property features a sun terrace and free WiFi access in all areas.

All units are air conditioned and features a seating area with a desk and chair. Some units include a dining area and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave and kettle. Every unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a bath and slippers. Towels and washing machine are available.

Ba Dinh Square is 700 metres from Sazi Apartment, while Quan Su Temple is 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from Sazi Apartment.
